Package Brick.Break.GameBoard

Class GameBoardView

java.lang.Object
Brick.Break.GameBoard.GameBoardView
public class GameBoardView
extends java.lang.Object
This is the View of Model class(GameBoard class) in the GameBoard MVC Design Pattern.
